page.title: 13Langford School Organisation
page.content: The school has three classes.In Class 1. are the Infant Children aged 5 to 7. In Class 2. are the Lower Juniors aged 7 to 9. In Class 3. are the Upper Juniors aged 9 to 11. The teachers usually stay with the same age range and so the children have the same teacher for more than one year. There are only a few children that live in Langford so most of them come to school by coach.Children coming from Alvescot and Black Bourton go to the Alvescot Infant School before moving into Class 2. at the age of 7.There are only about 4 or 5 that come from this school each year. Five local small schools, including Langford, have joined together to share a mini-bus and to organise activities and trips for the children.
